channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pavement crumbling, 11th December
item.description:
The pavement tarmac is crumbling away. Possible trip hazard.

item.title: Throw rope / life ring missing, 11th December
item.description:
Glassmill Pond is deep (signposts say this) yet there is no life ring or throw rope available. People shouldn't be getting into the pond but clearly they do as there's evidence of graffiti on the left bank wall. Also a member of the public keeps removing the boulders put at the end of the channel for a reason by Thames21.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Glassmill Lane, Shortlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car parked behind wheelchair accessible vehicle blocking access, 11th December
item.description:
I drive from my wheelchair and have a ramp at the back of my car allowing me to enter my car. A car (registration number: GK13 SKX) parked half in my disabled spot and half on the yellow line blocking my way in. As a result I had to leave my car there and take a taxi home

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gresham Street, City of London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Area keeps being filled with furniture, 11th December
item.description:
Sometimes they get taken away, but then some more furniture gets dumped there. As per the picture, the situation is becoming unsustainable. As we keeo getting furniture dumped and it should be illegal.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pope Street, Old Kent Road, Greater London

item.title: Wet leaf cleaning needed, 11th December
item.description:
Yesterday I slept and fallen down because of wet dumpy leaf on walking area. Luckily no serious injuries,however is a big safety hazard is very slipery. Please can someone deal with this matter.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lower Road, Lower Belvedere, Greater London

item.title: Huge pile of rubbish dumped here, 11th December
item.description:

item.title: Fly tipping on Chandler Way, 11th December
item.description:
Hi, there is a pile of flytipped rubbish on Chandler Way. There is also a whole car bumper added since I took the photo yesterday. Fly tipping on Chandler Way has reached new highs recently. Thanks for your continued help with this blight. Kind regards.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Savannah Close, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flt tipping by communal bins on Innes Street, 11th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Innes Street, Old Kent Road, Greater London

item.title: Glenister Road SE100HW, 11th December
item.description:
Once again, people fly-tipping on Glenister Road, Greenwich. You’ve only just cleared a load of rubbish round here, and now they've put more. it’s constant something needs to be done about it.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hawthorne Crescent, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet
